work.title: Google
work.subtitle: Marketing websites
work.summary: As part of Google's Brand Studio and Google for Work, I have worked on many different marketing websites and initiatives across the company and many different products.

petra.summary: I worked as part of a three-person developer team which built a beautiful Maps Streetview Treks site to showcase the famous Petra in Jordan.

inbox.summary: I was the developer who launched Google Inbox in 2014 and maintained until 2015.
